channel.title: Poacher fix(not sure if it goes here)
channel.description:
There's a glaring problem with poacher. He occupys. And guess why that is a problem. 1. He can't occupy people who are occupy immune. That's okay. But what isn't okay is when someone who wasn't occupy immune at the start of the game. Say a sheriff got occupied 3 times. Now you put a trap outside his door so when he investigates he gets occupyied But wait.... he's occupy immune. I feel as if poacher should go through GAINED occupy immunity. Meaning he can't occupy a drunk but he can occupy a sheriff who's been occupied three times. Would make poacher a lot more useful
Now I haven't played poacher so if he already goes through occupy immunity okay ignore everything but if not please?

item.title: Poacher fix(not sure if it goes here)
item.dc:creator: Aquillion
item.description:
Firelitten:

Poacher wants to occupy the sheriff. He can’t because he is occupy immune. Question I know they did that for a reason but why?

Doesn’t this apply to all occupying roles? Why do you think the Poacher should be treated differently?

(I’m open to the idea that maybe there is a reason, but I’m not seeing it right now.)

Read full topic
item.source: Poacher fix(not sure if it goes here)

item.title: Poacher fix(not sure if it goes here)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
So that the sheriff can eventually do something in the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Poacher fix(not sure if it goes here)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Doesn’t this apply to anyone who Occupys? Poacher is actually better here because he can spike trap the guy the sheriff is about to check and stop him anyway.
